thread.title: U.S., North Korea talks 'making good progress'

title: U.S., North Korea talks 'making good progress'
text:
U.S., North Korea talks 'making good progress' Thursday, May 31, 2018 - 02:12
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and North Korean envoy Kim Yong Chol ended a meeting early on Thursday after making 'good progress' in talks aimed at laying groundwork for a possible summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, the State Department said.
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and North Korean envoy Kim Yong Chol ended a meeting early on Thursday after making 'good progress' in talks aimed at laying groundwork for a possible summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, the State Department said. //in.reuters.com/video/2018/05/31/us-north-korea-talks-making-good-progres?videoId=431888933&videoChannel=13423
